NO.CAS-11(6)/2006/Div.I(ICAO SP) 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
Date:  05/02/2009 
 
CIRCULAR  NO.  03 / 2009 
 
 
Sub :  Frisking of all leaving the airside tarmac / technical area of 
airports. 
 
 
In continuation of BCAS Circular No. 14/2007 dated 11-12-2007, it is 
directed that all staff, when exiting the security restricted area of airports, shall be 
frisked on a random basis, so that any element of preparation of an unlawful act 
could be detected. 
 
2. 
This issues  with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) which will 
be implemented by all concerned with immediate effect. 
 
 
 
 
 
( D.S.Chauhan ) 
IPS 
Addl. Commissioner of Security(CA) 
 
Distributions as per list attached.
